item.title: The first Series by Marriott hotels are coming to the U.S. — here's why it's good news
item.description: Marriott's newest brand, Series by Marriott, will make its U.S. debut by converting five lifestyle hotels around the country.

item.title: How and why you might want to book a mileage run
item.description: If you're just shy of hitting an elite status level or want to chase a lucrative promotion, a mileage run might help. Here's what you should know.

item.title: How my Amex Platinum is helping me navigate Southwest's big changes
item.description: Checked bags no longer fly free on Southwest — but the Amex Platinum airline fee credit is here to help.

item.title: LATAM could make US push after big order for new Embraer jets
item.description: LATAM will use its new Embraer E195-E2s to add destinations and boost connectivity across its route map.

item.title: Amex Membership Rewards transfer partners: Redeem your points with airlines and hotels
item.description: Check out this complete guide to maximizing your American Express Membership Rewards points with its transfer partners.
